title: "Lumin Digital Partners with BioCatch to Enhance Fraud Detection Services"
excerpt: "BioCatch analyzes a user's physical and cognitive digital behavior to distinguish between genuine users and cybercriminals to detect fraud and identity theft. Many of the world's largest financial institutions leverage this technology to help protect their customers from digital banking fraud and other types of criminal activity,"
